attributes.action: Give full time carers their pension on top of their carer's allowances..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not fair that a full time carer, who looks after her bedridden son 24/7 who therefore saves the NHS/government thousands of pounds a year should not get her pension on reaching her 60th birthday. Why must they lose their carer's allowance to get the pension they have paid for.
